seniority_level.evidence: Title is 'Data Engineer' without seniority prefix, but requirements include both must-have and nice-to-have skills suggesting experienced professional rather than entry level

job_family.evidence: Title explicitly states 'Data Engineer' and role focuses on data pipelines, modeling, and platform development

sub_specialty.evidence: Title includes '(모델링)' meaning modeling, and data modeling is listed as must-have skill with focus on data marts and key tables

leadership_expectation.evidence: No mention of managing people, mentoring others, or team leadership responsibilities - pure individual contributor role

primary_cloud.evidence: No specific cloud provider mentioned in job posting or extraction results

secondary_clouds.evidence: No cloud providers mentioned at all

processing_paradigm.evidence: Focus on workflow managers (Airflow, Luigi, Dagster, Prefect) and scheduled data pipelines suggests batch processing paradigm

orchestrator_category.evidence: Airflow explicitly listed as must-have skill, along with other workflow managers

storage_layer.evidence: No specific data warehouse, lake, or storage technology mentioned in requirements

h1b_friendly.evidence: Citizenship text states 'hiring is mainly for domestic Korean nationals' and geo restriction to KR

opt_cpt_friendly.evidence: Korean residency requirement and domestic hiring focus excludes international students

citizenship_required.evidence: Text indicates hiring mainly for domestic Korean nationals, suggesting citizenship or permanent residency required

skill_inflation_detected.evidence: Requirements are reasonable for data engineering role - SQL, Python, workflow managers are standard skills without excessive demands
